hero.name: Varits Gorga
hero.heading: Hay! I’m Varits
hero.description: Hello! I'm a dynamic UI/UX and Front End Developer with 5 years of rich experience. My journey began in vocational high school, where I honed my skills as a Digital Creative, crafting designs, developing websites, and producing compelling videos. Let's elevate your projects together

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR DESIGN, DEVELOPMENT, EDITING PROJECTS
about.description: With over 5 years of expertise and 50+ successful projects for diverse clients, I'm poised to catapult your company's growth. My human-centric approach ensures reliable, innovative solutions that captivate and sell.

allExperience.companyDescription: Being an intern at Goodeva Technology is like painting with pixels, where every stroke of creativity merges seamlessly with innovation, crafting designs that not only captivate but also redefine the future of technology.

Freelancing as an illustration artist with Naver Z Corp is like dancing on the digital canvas of innovation. With each stroke of creativity, I craft visual narratives that breathe life into ideas, collaborating with a powerhouse of talent to shape the visual landscape of tomorrow.

Freelancing as a logo designer with Javarilis is akin to sculpting brand identities from raw inspiration. With each sleek line and vibrant hue, I fuse creativity with strategy, crafting timeless symbols that resonate with purpose. Together, we carve the path for brands to stand tall amidst the digital cacophony

Freelancing as a UI/UX designer with Javarilis is akin to orchestrating digital symphonies where every pixel harmonizes with user experience. With each interface I craft, I blend aesthetics with functionality, creating immersive journeys that captivate and compel. Together, we shape the digital landscape, one intuitive design at a time.

allExperience.designation: UI/UX Design, Graphic Design, Video Editor
allExperience.companyDescription: Freelancing as a UI/UX Designer, Graphic Designer, and Video Editor with Goodeva Technology is like conducting a multidimensional symphony of digital creativity. From sculpting seamless user experiences to weaving captivating visuals and narratives, every project is an opportunity to innovate and inspire. Together, we redefine the boundaries of digital expression, creating experiences that leave a lasting impact on users and audiences alike.

Freelancing on Fiverr is like embarking on a global voyage of creativity, where every gig is a new destination waiting to be explored. From crafting compelling logos to designing immersive websites, the platform is a bustling marketplace of talent and opportunity. With each project, I dive into a world of diverse needs and challenges, delivering top-notch solutions that exceed expectations and leave a lasting impression.

Working as a Creative Digital dynamo at Goodeva Technology feels like being at the heart of a digital renaissance. As a versatile force, I seamlessly blend the roles of web developer, web designer, video editor, graphic designer, and senior front-end developer into a symphony of innovation. Each project is an opportunity to weave together code, design, and storytelling, creating immersive experiences that push boundaries and inspire awe. Together, we craft digital masterpieces that not only captivate audiences but also redefine the very essence of technology.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Kami sangat terkesan dengan kinerja Varits dalam desain dan pengembangan. Kreativitas, ketelitian, dan dedikasinya luar biasa. Dia adalah aset berharga bagi perusahaan kami
Saya sangat bangga dengan kemampuan desain Varits. Keterampilan dan ketelitiannya luar biasa. Dia adalah aset berharga bagi tim, saya merekomendasikannya tanpa ragu untuk setiap proyek.

Dengan keahlian desain dan pengembangan website yang luar biasa, Varits menciptakan karya-karya yang benar-benar memukau. Setiap detailnya dipelajari dengan hati-hati, menghasilkan pengalaman online yang tak terlupakan. Saya sangat merekomendasikan Varits untuk solusi website berkualitas tinggi
Kerja sama dengan Varits luar biasa. Desainnya menginspirasi, memudahkan implementasi, dan meningkatkan pengalaman pengguna. Kita berhasil menciptakan produk luar biasa berkat sinergi ini
Desain Anda mengubah permainan. Memukau, memikat, dan memenuhi tujuan pemasaran kami dengan sempurna. Anda tidak hanya mendesain, Anda menciptakan karya seni yang memengaruhi. Luar biasa!
Kerja sama dengan Varits luar biasa. Desainnya menginspirasi, memudahkan implementasi, dan meningkatkan pengalaman pengguna. Kita berhasil menciptakan produk luar biasa berkat kolaborasi ini
